video.title: Mankind: The Story of All of Us
video.synopsis: This miniseries charts the rise of civilization, from the first flourishing of life in Mesopotamia through the discovery of America.

seasons.title: Mankind: The Story of All of Us: Season 1

episodes.synopsis: Mankind innovates to survive and thrive and, from humble beginnings, becomes the dominant creature on Earth, looking ahead to shape the future
episodes.title: Inventors

episodes.synopsis: Empires fall, but out of chaos, we build a new world order. From the birth of democracy to the creation of the Bible, people power reshapes mankind.
episodes.title: Iron Men

episodes.synopsis: Christianity rises from the Roman Empire, but in the Dark Ages, new forces emerge and set the stage for a clash of civilizations -- the Crusades.
episodes.title: Empires

episodes.synopsis: Europe enters a dark age, but from the fringes of the old Roman empire, two potent new forces-- Islam and Christianity -- emerge and clash.
episodes.title: Warriors

episodes.synopsis: The plague wreaks havoc in Asia and Europe. The Americas flourish in isolation. New inventions inspire the masses and beckon explorers to a new world.
episodes.title: Survivors

episodes.synopsis: The Aztec empire falls, Constantinople crumbles, Europeans find new trade routes. Gold and silver change the global economy, and the New World rises.
episodes.title: New World

episodes.synopsis: The ruthless Genghis Khan creates a mighty empire, but leaves 40 million dead in his wake. Yet a more powerful killer stalks mankind -- the plague.
episodes.title: Plague

episodes.synopsis: Silver coins minted in the Andes change the world economy. Millions enter the New World as slaves, but a handful come as pioneers looking for freedom.
episodes.title: Treasure

episodes.synopsis: Two revolutions entwine: America inspires liberty, and the Industrial Revolution frees man from nature's limits, but in time, the two ideals collide.
episodes.title: Revolutions

episodes.synopsis: The end of the Civil War ushers in an age of transformation and mass production. Man's power escalates dramatically -- for the better and the worse.
episodes.title: New Frontiers

episodes.synopsis: Mankind enters a new age of exploration and tames the wilderness. Ancient traditions yield to commerce and science, and a cry for freedom rings out.
episodes.title: Pioneers

episodes.synopsis: The post-Civil-War era brings advances and a sense of possibility. Progress exacts a price, but mankind persists on its expansive and amazing journey.
episodes.title: Speed
